attributes.action: Have M.S.C 32 Gothenburg Put Back In To 1987 Condition
attributes.additional_details: M.S.C 32 Gothenburg Is One Of Only 2 Surviving Canal Short Tanks And Is The Only One Of Two That Can Steam However Even Due To How Rare It Is It Has Been Painted To Look Like Thomas The Tank Engine. I Want It To Made That The ELR Have To Stump Up The Money To Repair The Running Gear (Motion) As Repaint The Engine In To The Conditon It Was In In 1987
